name: Cheezus
description: Cheezus is a typical platformer with a few twists in presentation and level design; it’s some of the worst code I’ve ever written, but I learned an immense amount putting it together and I’m still rather partial to it. You play as a piece of Swiss cheez and do some rather bizarre things(you’ll see what I mean). Music’s my original composition, sprites (the better ones, anyway) done by Rich “Spyke” DeFrancisco (this guy), and many thanks to the Lazy Foo for teaching me everything I know about SDL. Enjoy!
